newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil's Boavista to open office in London in Feb.
newsitem.headline: Brazil's Boavista to open office in London in Feb.

text.p: Brazilian private bank Banco Boavista said it will open an office in London in February to initially focus primarily on trade finance.
"The bank wants to strengthen its relationship with export companies by approaching European banks, which are very active in foreign trade," the bank said in a statement.
Boavista's trade finance portfolio currently totals $300 million.
The London office will be headed by Neri Infante, who has worked in the trade finance business for another Brazilian bank for 15 years, the statement said.
